snippet: The online publication, founded in 2007, will work with the Fales Library at New York University to preserve its digital content.
abstract: The online publication, founded in 2007, will work with the Fales Library at New York University to preserve its digital content.

headline.main: N.Y.U. Library Acquires Archive of the Digital Art Journal Triple Canopy
headline.print_headline: No Truck Needed To Haul This Archive
